_comment: This is a JSON file containing the dialogs. prefixes: Q = multi-choice question, I = information, E = text entry, N = number entry, Test = for testing purposes

QhasSaveFile.text: Do you wish to load a save file ?

EfileName.text: Enter the name of your save file :

NdepositGold.text: How much gold do you want to deposit to your guild's treasury ?

IfileLoadError.text: Error loading save file. Starting a new game.

InoStandardSaveFile.text: No standard save file found. Retrying...

QquitGame.text: Do you wish to quit the game ?
